item.title:
Teaser trailer for Martin Scorsese’s ‘Killers of the Flower Moon’ starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Robert De Niro, Lily Gladstone and Jesse Plemons.
In theaters October 6, 2023.

item.title: 22 years ago, ‘SHREK’ was released in theaters.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
John Cena says that after being rejected from the audition, a run in with Margot Robbie led him to appear in ‘BARBIE’
“[She asked], ‘Why don’t you do #Barbie ?’ I said, ‘I’ve been trying!’ And Margot makes a lot of the decisions for that and I said, ‘I’ll do whatever you need.'”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Monica Barbaro and Elle Fanning will play love interests to Timothee Chalamet’s Bob Dylan in biopic ‘A COMPLETE UNKNOWN’ as Joan Baez and Sylvie Russo.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Eddie Murphy in talks to star in a live-action/CGI hybrid ‘PINK PANTHER’ movie.
He would star as Inspector Clouseau in the film directed by Sonic The Hedgehog’s Jeff Fowler.
http://thr.cm/A8Vdqzo
